amendment.description: To require notice of regulations relating to travel agent service fees.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1941 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1941 proposed by Senator Shelby for Senator Reid. (consideration: CR S13118; text: CR S13118) To require notice of regulations relating to travel agent service fees.
